org.jacp.api.component

Interface ISubComponent<L,A,M>

  • Type Parameters:
    L - defines the action listener type
    A - defines the basic action type
    M - defines the basic message type
    All Superinterfaces:
    IComponent<L,A,M>, IHandleable<A,M>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ICallbackComponent<L,A,M>, IComponentView<C,L,A,M>, IStatelessCallabackComponent<L,A,M>, UIComponent<C,L,A,M>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AFXComponent, AStatefulCallbackComponent, AStatelessCallbackComponent, ASubComponent

    public interface ISubComponent<L,A,M>
extends IComponent<L,A,M>, IHandleable<A,M>
    Defines a subcomponent handled by a root component. A subcomponent is running in a perspective environment an can be represented by an visible UI or non visible background component.
    Author:
    Andy Moncsek

    • Method Summary
